SamPy.fitting.SplineFitting.SplineFitting¶

class SamPy.fitting.SplineFitting.SplineFitting(xnodes, spline_order=3)¶

Fits a B-spline representation of 1-D curve. Uses Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm for minimizing the sum of squares.

__init__(xnodes, spline_order=3)¶

Methods

__init__(xnodes[, spline_order])
doFit(ynodes, x, y) Return the point which minimizes the sum of squares of M (non-linear)
errfunc(ynodes, x, y) Error function.
fitfunc(x, ynodes) Function that is fitted.
